Text: Great torrent! Alas, I've watched all of this already :)

Great to see that so many people were interested in these. It's ok for me that people don't seed, but I just can't continue seeding this much longer. I've now shared this torrent on a ratio at 1:30 but will have to stop soon. So if you want this torrent kept alive, please start sharing! I'll keep it open for another week or so, then it's up to you!
